    • Constructor Detail

      • Ghost

        public Ghost(int x,
             int y,
             int speed,
             App app,
             java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> modeLengths)
        Constructs a ghost with x and y grid coordinates.
        Parameters:
        x - the x grid coordinate
        y - the y grid coordinate
        speed - the speed
        app - the app, used for drawing
        modeLengths - a list of integers specifying time spent on each mode, scatter or chase

    • Method Detail

      • getCurMode

        public GhostMode getCurMode()
        Returns current mode of the ghost.
        Returns:
        current mode

      • getPrevMode

        public GhostMode getPrevMode()
        Returns previous mode of the ghost, used when ghost exiting frightened mode and returning to its previous mode.
        Returns:
        previous mode

      • getCorner

        public Cell getCorner()
        Returns the corner cell the ghost will scatter towards.
        Returns:
        the ghost's target corner cell

      • draw

        public boolean draw()
        Draws the ghost. The image depends on its current state as frightened, normal, or invisible.
        Overrides:
        draw in class Actor
        Returns:
        true if ghost can be drawn, otherwise false when dead

      • drawDebugLine

        public boolean drawDebugLine()
        Draws the debug line, connecting the ghost to where it is targetting.
        Returns:
        true if can be drawn, false when frightened or dead

      • tick

        public boolean tick()
        Updates the ghost after one frame, and how it responds to the updated arena and other entities. Does not draw the ghost.
        Specified by:
        tick in class Actor
        Returns:
        true if can be updated, otherwise false when dead

      • updateMode

        public void updateMode()
        Updates the mode of the ghost. When frightened, update the frightened counter only. When unfrightened, updates the mode according to the modelengths and resets to the first modelength when all modelengths have been iterated through.

      • setTarget

        public void setTarget(Collide chaseTarget)
        Sets the target of the ghost depending on the mode. If currently SCATTER, then only set to corner. If CHASE, then set to the given target which different types of ghost will pass in.
        Parameters:
        chaseTarget - the target cell or actor to chase

      • beFrightened

        public void beFrightened()
        Sets ghost to be frightened only if currently not frightened. If soda-frightened, then reset to normal frightened. Set the frightened counter to the configured time and set sprite to frightened.

      • unFrightened

        public void unFrightened()
        Sets ghost to be unfrightened and can kill waka again. Removes any type of frightened, including sodaFrightened. Sets mode back to previous mode, and sprite back to the normal sprite.

      • beSodaFright

        public void beSodaFright()
        Sets ghost to be soda-frightened by calling normal frightened then adding on top of that. Switches sprite to the soda sprite.

      • move

        public boolean move()
        Selects a direction depending on target and current state, then move towards that direction.
        Specified by:
        move in class Actor
        Returns:
        always true as ghosts cannot pause at wall

      • chase

        public void chase(Collide entity)
        Updates direction based on current state and given entity. If frightened move in a random and valid direction, such as not backing on itself.
        Parameters:
        entity - the chasing target

      • possibleMoves

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Double,Direction> possibleMoves(Collide entity)
        Returns possible directions with their respective distance to a given entity that the ghost can make for current direction. Returns an empty map if no direction available.
        Parameters:
        the - chase target
        Returns:
        map containing directions as values, distance as key

      • canMove

        public double canMove(Direction d,
                      Collide entity)
        Similar to tryMove(), but does not actually move ghost. Checks if direction is valid and returns its distance to a given entity.
        Parameters:
        d - hypothetical direction to travel in
        entity - the target to calculate distance to

      • distanceTo

        public double distanceTo(Collide entity)
        Returns euclidian distance towards an entity from current position.
        Returns:
        distance to entity from current distance in pixels

      • interact

        public int interact()
        Deprecated, only to use for Waka for ending the game.
        Specified by:
        interact in class Actor
        Returns:
        integer 0 always.

      • die

        public void die()
        Sets the ghost to die.

      • isDead

        public boolean isDead()
        Returns whether ghost is dead.
        Returns:
        true if ghost is dead

      • isFrightened

        public boolean isFrightened()
        Returns whether ghost is frightened.
        Returns:
        true if ghost is frightened

      • isSodaFrightened

        public boolean isSodaFrightened()
        Returns whether ghost is soda-frightened.
        Returns:
        true if ghost is soda-frightened

      • resetGhost

        public void resetGhost()
        Rests ghost to starting position, sprite, modes, position in modeLengths, and re-animates the ghost to become alive again... boo!
